output: html_notebook

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, error = TRUE)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=TRUE}
library(ade4)
library(factoextra)
library(corrplot)
```
## Cars Dataset

```{r}

data("mtcars")

corrplot(cor(mtcars))
```

```{r }
mypca<-dudi.pca(mtcars[,1:10],scannf = F)
mypca
```

```{r}
fviz_pca_biplot(mypca)
```

```{r }
## alter this code to improve it
mypca<-dudi.pca(mtcars[,1:10],scannf = F)
fviz_pca_biplot(mypca,repel = T)
fviz_pca_biplot(mypca,repel = T,label = "ind",title = "Car model")
fviz_pca_biplot(mypca,repel = T,label="var",title="Car variables")
```
